reflections:
By the end of Week 1, I will accurately recognize and read all Hiragana and Katakana by completing all cards in the Tofugu Hiragana and Katakana decks.

Specific: Learn to recognize and read all Hiragana and Katakana characters.
Measurable: Complete 100% of the Tofugu Kana decks.
Achievable: 20–30 minutes/day for 7 days.
Relevant: Kana is essential for reading vocabulary and grammar.
Time-bound: Complete by Day 7.

By the end of Month 1, I will learn at least 300 Japanese words by studying 10–15 new cards daily from the Core 2k/6k Optimized deck.

Specific: Learn the first 300 most common Japanese words.
Measurable: Study 10–15 new cards/day from the Core 2k/6k Optimized deck.
Achievable: Fits a 30 min/day schedule.
Relevant: Core vocabulary allows you to understand basic sentences and anime.
Time-bound: Complete by Day 30.

By Day 30, I will complete at least 20 Tae Kim grammar cards and read 5 NHK Easy news articles to build foundational comprehension and begin reading real Japanese.

Specific: Learn the essential beginner grammar patterns and read simple Japanese texts.
Measurable: Complete 20–30 Tae Kim grammar cards + read 5 NHK Easy articles.
Achievable: Fits with 5–10 min/day grammar + 10 min/day reading.
Relevant: Grammar + reading accelerates comprehension and long-term fluency.
Time-bound: Complete by Day 30.
subtasks: Specific: Learn to recognize and read all Hiragana and Katakana characters.
Measurable: Complete 100% of the Tofugu Kana decks.
Relevant: Kana is essential for reading vocabulary and grammar.
